sen.j: 琴伝流（きんでんりゅう）は、全国に40万人以上の会員と1万人以上の講師 (教育)陣を擁する日本最大の大正琴流派である。
sen.e: Kindenryu school is the largest school of taishogoto (Taisho lyre) in Japan which have more than four hundred thousand members and more than ten thousand teachers.
Kindenryu school is the largest school of taishogoto (Taisho lyre) in Japan which have more than four hundred thousand members and more than ten thousand teachers.
Kinden school is the largest school of taishogoto (Taisho lyre) in Japan which have more than four hundred thousand members and more than ten thousand teachers throughout Japan.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: （有）日本ヴァイオリン研究所大正琴全国普及会が運営し、組織の正式名称は琴伝流大正琴全国普及会。
sen.e: It is operated by Nihon Violin Kenkyusho Taishogoto Zenkoku Fukyukai and the official name of the organization is Kindenryu Taishogoto Zenkoku Fukyukai.
sen.cmt: 組織名の正規の英文の表記が確認できないため、ローマ字綴りで表記しました。
sen.e: It is operated by Nihon Violin Kenkyusho Taishogoto Zenkoku Fukyukai and the official name of the organization is Kindenryu Taishogoto Zenkoku Fukyukai.

The school is operated by Nihon Violin Kenkyusho Taishogoto Zenkoku Fukyukai and the official name of the organization is Kindenryu Taishogoto Zenkoku Fukyukai (Extension Association of Kinden school of Taishogoto).
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

tit.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

From the Komagane Interchange, Chuo Expressway, approximately fifteen minutes driving south on Ina Koiki Nodo route

sen.j: 九州本部（〒810-0022 福岡市中央区 (福岡市)薬院一丁目6番14号 ZZZ-2ビル1・4階）
sen.e: Kyushu Headquarters (ZZZ-2 Bldg. 1/4 Floors, Yakuin 1-chome, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka City 810-0022)
Kyushu Headquarters (ZZZ-2 Bldg. 1/4 Floors, Yakuin 1-chome, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka City 810-0022)
Kyushu Headquarters (ZZZ-2 Bldg. 1/4 Floors, 6-14, Yakuin 1-chome, Chuo Ward, Fukuoka City 810-0022)

sen.j: 他の流派にはない大正琴アンサンブルというこれまでの常識を大きく覆す新境地を開拓した。
sen.e: It has broke new ground, taishogoto music ensemble, which no other school has and went beyond common practice until that time.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: It broke new ground with its taishogoto music ensemble not seen in any other schools..
It broke new ground with its taishogoto music ensemble not seen at any other schools.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: （従来からあるソプラノに加えて、昭和50年代前半にアルト・テナー・ベース、計3種の大正琴を開発した。）
sen.e: (In addition to existing soprano, it developed three types of Taishogoto, alto, tenor and bass, in the latter half of 1970's.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: (In addition to existing soprano, it developed three types of Taishogoto, alto, tenor and bass, in the latter half of the 1970's.)
(In addition to conventional soprano, it developed three types of taishogoto, alto, tenor and bass, in the latter half of the 1970's.)
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 新たな音楽文化の第一歩を踏み出した。
sen.e: With this, it too a step forward to new culture of music.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: With this, it brought a new step forward to the culture of music.
With this, it took the first step on a new music culture.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 最大流派の優位性を生かして大正琴及び属品の価格も他流派より安く設定し、老若男女あらゆる世代が大正琴を楽しめるよう様々な取り組みをしている。
sen.e: By making the most of predominance of the largest school, it set prices of taishogoto and accessories cheaper than other schools and making various efforts so that people of all generations can enjoy taishogoto.

By making the most of their dominance among the largest schools, it set cheaper prices for taishogoto and accessories than other schools and made various efforts so that people of all generations could enjoy taishogoto.

By making the most of their dominance as the largest schools, it set lower prices for taishogoto and accessories than other schools and makes various efforts so that people of all ages and both sexes can enjoy taishogoto.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: さらに全国各地で日頃の練習の成果を発表する場としてコンサートを積極的に開催している。
sen.e: Also, it has been holding concerts positively in various places nationwide as places to disclose publicly the results of daily practice.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: Also, it has been holding concerts in various places nationwide as a venue to publicly disclose the results of daily practice.
Also, it has been holding concerts throughout Japan for providing opportunities for students to show the results of daily practice.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 各地区や都道府県単位の発表会から全国大会まで、大正琴の美しい音色（アンサンブル）を聴ける場を多くの人に幅広く提供している。
sen.e: It has been providing a large number of persons places to hear beautiful sound of taishogoto (music ensemble) from school performance in each area or prefecture to nationwide assemblies.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外措置
sen.e: It has been providing a large number of people a place to hear the beautiful sound of taishogoto (music ensemble) from local school performances to prefecture and nationwide assemblies.
It has been providing a large number of people a place to hear the beautiful sound of taishogoto (music ensemble) from local school performances to prefecture and nationwide assemblies.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: また本社では大正琴の製造工程が見学できる他、歴代（森田伍郎発明当時の品から現代に至るまで）の大正琴及び古い楽譜やレコードが展示され、大正琴の歴史を知ることができる。
sen.e: In headquarters also, in addition to observation tour of the manufacturing processes of taishogoto, taishogoto of each generation (from one at the time of invention by Goro MORITA to current one), old sheets of music and records are displayed and we can learn the history of taishogoto.

At headquarters, in addition to an observation tour of the manufacturing processes of taishogoto, taishogoto of each generation (which ranges from the original taishogoto invented by Goro MORITA to the most modern one), old sheets of music and records are displayed allowing people to learn the history of taishogoto.

At the head office, in addition to an observation tour of the manufacturing processes of taishogoto, taishogoto of each generation (which ranges from the original taishogoto invented by Goro MORITA to the present one), old sheets of music and record albums are displayed allowing people to learn the history of taishogoto.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: さらにここの見学者は希望により大正琴の演奏を体験でき、これをきっかけに本格的に大正琴を習い始めたい場合はスタッフが全国各地の琴伝流講師陣を紹介してくれる。
sen.e: Visitors to this place, if wished, may try to perform taishogoto, and if any of visitors want to start learning taishogoto with this as a start, the staff will introduce instructors of Kindenryu in various places nationwide.

Visitors to this place, if wished, may try to perform taishogoto, and if any visitors want to start learning taishogoto, the staff will introduce instructors of Kindenryu from various places nationwide.

Visitors to this place, if they wish, will have an opportunity to perform taishogoto, and if visitors want to start learning taishogoto, the staff will introduce instructors of Kinden school from various places nationwide.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: なお大正琴及びその属品（楽譜・アンプ・ケーブル・チューナー・各種補修部品等）は一般店頭販売を行っていないが、同社ホームページからも入手できる。
sen.e: Although taishogoto and accessories (scores, amplifiers, cables, tuners, various spare parts, etc.) are not available in usual stores, but they can be purchased through the homepage of the company.
Although taishogoto and accessories (scores, amplifiers, cables, tuners, various spare parts, etc.) are not available in normal stores, they can be purchased through the company homepage.
Although taishogoto and accessories (scores, amplifiers, cables, tuners, various spare parts, etc.) are not available in normal stores, they can be purchased through the company homepage.

sen.j: 平成18年からは、次世代の大正琴音楽文化を担う後継者育成のため流派を問わず参加できる「全国子供大正琴コンクール」をスタートさせたほか、大正琴愛好者に最も好まれた曲を歌った歌手に贈られる「大正琴音楽大賞」も創設した。
sen.e: From 2006, in order to foster successors the next generation who promote musical culture of taishogoto, "Nationwide Children's Taishogoto Contest," for which player of any school may take part in, was launched and Taishogoto Ongaku Taisho (literally, big award of taishogoto music) to be give to a singer who sings a song which was most liked by taishogoto fan was established.

From 2006, in order to foster successors for the next generation to promote the musical culture of taishogoto, a "Nationwide Children's Taishogoto Contest," open to players from any school was launched and the Taishogoto Ongaku Taisho (literally, big award of taishogoto music)is given to the singer who sings a song most liked by taishogoto fans.

From 2006, in order to foster the next generation of players who will promote the music culture of taishogoto, a 'Nationwide Children's Taishogoto Contest,' open to players from any school was launched and the 'Taishogoto Ongaku Taisho' was established, and is given to the singer who sings the song most liked by taishogoto fans.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: なお「大正琴音楽大賞」の受賞者は、平成18年の第1回が北島三郎(「風雪ながれ旅」で受賞)、平成19年が秋川雅史(「千の風になって」で受賞)。
sen.e: The prize winners of the "Taishogoto Ongaku Taisho" were Saburo KITAJIMA for the first time in 1906 (with the song "Fusetsu Nagaretabi") and, for 1907, Masashi AKIKAWA (with the song "Sen no kazeni natte").
The winner of the first "Taishogoto Ongaku Taisho" in 1906 was Saburo KITAJIMA (with the song "Fusetsu Nagaretabi") followed by Masashi AKIKAWA (with the song "Sen no kazeni natte") in 1907.
The winner of the first 'Taishogoto Ongaku Taisho' in 2006 was Saburo KITAJIMA (for the song 'Fusetsu Nagaretabi') followed by Masafumi AKIKAWA (for the song 'Sen no kazeni natte') in 2007.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。Masashi→Masafumiに変更しました。

sen.j: 平成20年には琴伝流会員2,864名により大正琴の一斉演奏のギネス記録(従来記録1,034名)の更新をした。
sen.e: In 1908, 2,864 members of Kindenryu school renewed the Guinness record for group performance of taishogoto (record before that was 1,34 players).
In 1908, 2,864 members of Kindenryu school renewed the Guinness record for largest group performance of taishogoto (record before that was 1,034 players).
In 2008, 2,864 members of Kinden school broke its own Guinness record for largest group performance of taishogoto (record before that was 1,034 players).
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: また、全長210.5cm重さ23.2kgの世界一大きな大正琴もギネス記録として認定され、２つのギネス記録を持っている。
sen.e: The biggest taishogoto in the world, with the total length of 210.5 cm, and weight of 23.2 kg was approved as a Guinness record and, eventually, it has two Guinness records.
The biggest taishogoto in the world, with a total length of 210.5 cm, and weight of 23.2 kg was approved as a Guinness record eventually leading to two Guinness records.
The biggest taishogoto in the world, with a total length of 210.5 cm, and weight of 23.2 kg was awarded a Guinness record; eventually, Kinden became a two Guinness records holder..
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 更に、平成20年の5月から6月にかけてANA全日本空輸の国際線機内放送「スカイチャンネル」に琴伝流の大正琴が採用された。
sen.e: From May to June 2008, taishogoto by Kindenryu school was adopted for "Sky Channel" (in-flight music for international flight) of the All Nippon Airways (ANA).
From May to June 2008, taishogoto by Kindenryu school was adopted for "Sky Channel" (in-flight music for international flight) by All Nippon Airways (ANA).
From May to June 2008, taishogoto by Kindenryu school was adopted for 'Sky Channel' (in-flight music for international flight) by All Nippon Airways (ANA).
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。
